---
title: LockdownApi.lockdownd_client_set_label method
---

Sets the label to send for requests to lockdownd.

```csharp
public virtual void lockdownd_client_set_label(LockdownClientHandle client, string label)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| client | The lockdown client |
| label | The label to set or NULL to disable sending a label |
